house_listing.house_description: This 1 level detached single family home built in 1959 has 3 bedroom(s), 1.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1050 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
